label: Yes
text: All Parties agree not to disparage or make derogatory comments, verbal or written, regarding the other Party during the Term of the Agreement, and for one year thereafter.

label: No
text: Upon expiration of the Initial Term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for consecutive one (1) year periods, unless terminated by Reseller within sixty (60) days prior to the expiration of the Initial Term or any renewal term, as the case may be (the Initial Term and each renewal term, collectively, the "Term").

label: No
text: The engagement letters will (unless otherwise agreed) provide that payments would be made to either SMBC/Nikko or Moelis Holdings and SMBC/Nikko and Moelis Holdings will split the fees pursuant to this Agreement.

label: No
text: Network retains the right at all times during the Term to discontinue its distribution of the Service in its entirety and to terminate this Agreement and all other affiliates' agreements on at least ninety (90) days' prior notice without any liability therefor to Affiliate, other than amounts payable hereunder which accrued prior to such termination, including amounts payable pursuant to Section 6(b) and Exhibit D.

label: Yes
text: Each party agrees that, during the Term of this Agreement and for a period of five (5) years thereafter, neither will make written or oral comments regarding the other that are negative, disparaging, tend to bring the other into disrepute or call into question the business acumen, character, honesty or integrity of the other.

label: Yes
text: However, conduct which Company, in its discretion, deems detrimental to Company's image or reputation, shall be grounds for termination of this Agreement, upon reasonable notice and the failure to cure such behavior by Distributor.
